hero.headline: Better, Faster, & Smaller AI Models
hero.subtitle: 3LC had powerful technology for improving ML models through data quality. We partnered on strategic brand development, customer research, and product formulation to translate that capability into a product data scientists actually love.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: 3LC came to us with a powerful technology: a way to improve ML models by fixing training data in real-time. They needed help translating that technical capability into a product that data scientists would actually use and love.

cards.title: Technical Complexity
cards.description: The underlying technology was sophisticated: real-time data editing, model retraining, metrics tracking. Making this accessible without dumbing it down was the core challenge.

cards.title: Developer Audience
cards.description: Data scientists and ML engineers are demanding users. They want power and flexibility, not hand-holding. The product needed to feel like a tool for experts.

cards.title: Market Positioning
cards.description: The data-centric AI space was emerging but undefined. 3LC needed clear positioning that explained their unique approach: 'Three Lines of Code to better models.'

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We embedded with 3LC's team for 18 months, conducting deep user research, defining product strategy, and designing the end-to-end experience.

steps.title: User Research
steps.description: 40+ interviews with ML engineers and data scientists across energy, finance, and healthcare sectors.

steps.title: Market Analysis
steps.description: Competitive analysis of the emerging data-centric AI landscape. Identifying white space and positioning.

steps.title: Product Strategy
steps.description: Defining the 'Three Lines of Code' positioning. Developer-first tool with enterprise-grade security.

steps.title: Design & Launch
steps.description: End-to-end UX/UI design, design system, usability testing, and launch support.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: We designed every aspect of the 3LC platform, from data visualization to sample editing to metrics dashboards, with the needs of ML practitioners at the center.

cards.title: Data Visualization
cards.description: Interactive 3D visualization of training data distributions, outliers, and quality issues. Making invisible data problems visible.

cards.title: Sample Editing
cards.description: Direct editing of training samples with real-time model impact preview. Fix data, improve models, see results immediately.

cards.title: Metrics Dashboard
cards.description: Track model performance improvements over time. Connect data changes to outcome improvements with clear causality.

cards.title: Integration Patterns
cards.description: Seamless integration with existing ML workflows. Jupyter notebooks, Python scripts, CI/CD pipelines.

cards.title: Progressive Disclosure
cards.description: Complex functionality revealed as needed. Power users get depth, new users get clarity.

cards.title: Dark Theme UI
cards.description: Navy and yellow design system optimized for long work sessions. Professional feel that respects data scientists' expertise.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Our 18-month partnership took 3LC from promising technology to market-ready product with enterprise customers and clear brand positioning.

metrics.label: Customer Interviews Conducted
metrics.description: Deep user research revealing market needs and opportunities.

metrics.label: Seed Funding Secured
metrics.description: With Daito's UX and marketing work as foundation, 3LC raised seed round from quality investors.

metrics.label: Enterprise Partnership
metrics.description: Secured partnership with Equinor, major energy company, leveraging Daito's agentic experience positioning.

metrics.label: Market-Ready & Loved
metrics.description: Platform that data scientists advocate for, not just tolerate.
